spoken-english-week13_key2:
Hello!! 
This is your Class 13 for Spoken English course module.
spoken-english-week13_key5: Explain to them the concept of giving

spoken-english-week13_key8: Why is it important to give
spoken-english-week13_key10:
Finish the Story Game:
The Finish the story game is a fun group activity which develops students storytelling, communication skill, sentence making and grammar. The aim of the game is to create a complete story as a team. Going around in a circle each player will contribute one sentence to the story.
spoken-english-week13_key11:
Example:
Volunteer: As the rain poured, I walked to…
spoken-english-week13_key14: Student: Dancing. So I asked him…
spoken-english-week13_key15: Volunteer: What are you doing here? He replied…
spoken-english-week13_key16: Student: I’m here to eat you all! I ran…
spoken-english-week13_key17: Volunteer: To my mom’s house. And shouted…
spoken-english-week13_key18: Student: Mom, where’s my lunch? She said…
spoken-english-week13_key19: Volunteer: Your lunch is at school. So I walked…
spoken-english-week13_key21: Volunteer: The alien had my lunch. However…
spoken-english-week13_key22: Student: That alien was my dad. And then…
spoken-english-week13_key23: Volunteer: We laughed. My dad called me a…
spoken-english-week13_key27: Once upon a time , the prince
spoken-english-week13_key28: While I was walking home, I saw
spoken-english-week13_key30:
As I was leaving the house,
Word of the Week
Empower (verb): make (someone) stronger and more confident,
especially in controlling their life and claiming their rights.
Eg. My passion lies in empowering and uplifting others.
spoken-english-week13_key32:
Pair and Share: (For each question - first volunteer shares, then student)

spoken-english-week13_key59: Empathy (noun): the ability to understand and share the feelings of another.
spoken-english-week13_key60: Example: I have empathy for my mother’s difficulties
spoken-english-week13_key61:
Empathy vs. Sympathy: Sympathy means pity or feeling sorrow forsomeone else (from a distance); Empathy is actually allowing
yourself to fully feel the other person’s feelings by putting yourself in the other person’s shoes
